page.title: 03Home Life(Mondays).
page.content: Monday begins at eight o'clock when I wake up and go straight into the bathroom, get washed and clean my teeth. I go to Peacefield Primary School so I normally wear a sweatshirt or jumper. I have cornflakes for breakfast, they are small flakes on which you pour sugar and milk. Sarah,my friend, calls for me to go to school. When I arrive at school I go into the classroom and get out my reading book(it is"The Fiend Next Door").At 9.00 o'clock we have assembly.Monday morning is P.E. in the hall and we do gym. Sometimes we go outside and play rounders, short tennis or uni-hock. The second lesson is Maths, followed by English, and Spelling Workshop. School finishes at 3.30 pm. and I walk home with my friends.
